content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the changes in the population of the Hawaiian Islands from 1872 to 1878 ?

choices.label: The increased presence of Asian indentured servants on Hawaiian plantations
The growth of tourism as a result of technological advances in transportation
The urbanization of Hawaii as a result of industrialization
The development of racial exclusion policies in European settler colonies

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
